mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_channel_detail (product_id, basic_channel_id, channel_type_sign, channel_type, product_trade_rate, product_balance_type, product_withdraw_fee, product_merchant_pay_rate, product_merchant_withdraw_fee, status )VALUES( #{productId}, #{basicChannelId}, #{channelTypeSign}, #{channelType}, #{productTradeRate}, #{productBalanceType}, #{productWithdrawFee}, #{productMerchantPayRate}, #{productMerchantWithdrawFee}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product_channel_detail SET product_id = #{productId}, basic_channel_id = #{basicChannelId}, channel_type_sign = #{channelTypeSign}, channel_type = #{channelType}, product_trade_rate = #{productTradeRate}, product_balance_type = #{productBalanceType}, product_withdraw_fee = #{productWithdrawFee}, product_merchant_pay_rate = #{productMerchantPayRate}, product_merchant_withdraw_fee = #{productMerchantWithdrawFee}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_product_channel_detail WHERE product_id = #{id} AND channel_type_sign = #{channelSignId} AND status = 2
SELECT * FROM tb_product_channel_detail WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND status = 2
SELECT * FROM tb_product_channel_detail WHERE channel_type_sign = #{payChannel} AND status = 2
SELECT * FROM tb_product_channel_detail WHERE product_id = #{productId} and channel_type=#{channelType} and status = 2 limit 0,1
SELECT * FROM tb_product_channel_detail WHERE product_id = #{productId} and channel_type_sign = #{channelTypeSign} AND status = 2

SELECT p.id, p.channel_type_sign, b.channel_short_name, (case when b.support_way=1 then '扫码支付' when b.support_way=2 then '公众号支付' when b.support_way=3 then '扫码，公众号支付' when b.support_way=4 then '快捷支付' else '' end) support_way FROM tb_product_channel_detail AS p LEFT JOIN tb_basic_channel AS b ON p.basic_channel_id = b.id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND p.`status` = 2 AND b.`status` = 2 ORDER BY p.channel_type_sign
